subject: Procurement of ex-servicemen for fee collection from the office of Directorate General of Resettlement (DGR)
text: HR 7cftq <THT wfera<ut TM Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (T7 4art, 734 4aaw 3 TaTHT TAT4) #H Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 #T R "M QA Extn : 2223 2318 2468 2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping, Road Transport and Highways) fff-5 W 6, 7qer-10, ERaT;, T fanmt-110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/ 13013/22/04-05/CMD-CO/DGR (Vol.IV) 15.06.2007 CIRCULAR NO: NHAILCQMMERCEAL OPERATIONS 88 1 This circular is issued in super session of the following circulars:- NHAI/ COMMERCIAL/ OPERATION _ 14 dated 20.2.2003 NHAI/ COMMERCIAL/ OPERATION/46 dated 13.1.2004 NHAI/ COMMERCIAL/ OPERATION/63 dated 27.7.2005 2_ As per policy of NHAI fee collection on all sections of National Highways is to be undertaken  through ex servicemen /agencies  sponsored by Director General Resettlement (DGR) till implementation of Operate, Maintain and Transfer (OMT) concept, In order to enter in to an agreement with DGR sponsored ex- servicemen / agencies for fee collection, a revised draft contract document is enclosed. 3. Selection procedure of ex-servicemen a_ Each PIU / CMU must ensure commencement of selection procedure of eX- servicemen /agencies at least 120 to likely of commencement of fee collection at the stretch b In case of  replacement of an existing agency due to its unsatisfactory performance, selection procedure of new agency must be initiated immediately on receipt of directions from Head Office without any delay and must ensure engagement of new agency within the time prescribed by Head Office. Project Director of the PIU/CMU will seek sponsorship of 5-7 ex- servicemen from DGR by providing name of the section, location of fee plaza, likely of commencement of fee collection/engagement of the agency, requirement of man power etc_ at the address mentioned below, under intimation to Head Office Director (Self Employment) Directorate General of Resettlement (DGR) Ministry of Defence, Govt: of India RK Puram, West Block ~IV, New Delhi 110066 Tel. 26192356 d, A locally constituted committee may judge the suitability of ex-servicemen sponsored by DGR comprising of the following members: Project Director of the concerned PIU / CMU as Chairman. (i1) Project Director of the adjacent PIU / CMU as Member_ (iii) Manager (Tech) of the concerned PIU / CMU as Member. (iv) A representative from finance division of the concerned PIU / CMU.
